description: Hot daddy, Adam Herst, is looking for company when he comes across a BOGO deal of a lifetime! Without hesitation he jumps on the deal, and invites over two hot young escorts, Andres Moreno and Luke Alexander. In no time the commanding daddy tells Andres and Luke to make him "feel like a god," and they do! They let Adam take turns drilling their tight young holes before he has them taste his seed, proving things only get better with age.
title: Daddy's Hos
